snippet: The Choir of Men and Boys at St. Thomas Church and the Fretwork ensemble presented a program of mostly Renaissance works.
lead_paragraph: The Choir of Men and Boys at St. Thomas Church and the Fretwork ensemble presented a program of mostly Renaissance works.

headline.seo: ‘My Days,’ Homage to Elizabethan Music at St. Thomas Church
headline.main: Love Child of a Renaissance Spirit
